BR_text.BRdescription:
Note: Providing complete information in the most concise form is the best way to get help. This issue template serves as the checklist for essential information to most of the technical issues and bug reports. For non-technical issues and feature requests, feel free to present the information in what you believe is the best form.
 For Q & A and discussion, please start a discussion thread at <denchmark-link:https://discuss.mxnet.io>https://discuss.mxnet.io</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
 
 (Brief description of the problem in no more than 2 sentences.)
 <denchmark-h:h2>Environment info (Required)</denchmark-h>
 
 Clearlinux
 incubator-mxnet 1.5.0
 <denchmark-code>What to do:
 1. Download the diagnosis script from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/master/tools/diagnose.py
 2. Run the script using `python diagnose.py` and paste its output here.
 
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Package used (Python/R/Scala/Julia):
 (I'm using ...)
 For Scala user, please provide:
 
 Java version: (java -version)
 Maven version: (mvn -version)
 Scala runtime if applicable: (scala -version)
 
 For R user, please provide R sessionInfo():
 <denchmark-h:h2>Build info (Required if built from source)</denchmark-h>
 
 Compiler (gcc/clang/mingw/visual studio):
 MXNet commit hash:
 (Paste the output of git rev-parse HEAD here.)
 Build config:
 (Paste the content of config.mk, or the build command.)
 <denchmark-h:h2>Error Message:</denchmark-h>
 
 (Paste the complete error message, including stack trace.)
 <denchmark-h:h2>Minimum reproducible example</denchmark-h>
 
 (If you are using your own code, please provide a short script that reproduces the error. Otherwise, please provide link to the existing example.)
 <denchmark-h:h2>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 (Paste the commands you ran that produced the error.)
 
 compiling with USE_BLAS as openblas,
 on 1.5.0 version don't we need to change use_blas on Makefile?
 open to openblas?
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>What have you tried to solve it?</denchmark-h>
 
 
 change Makefile, open to openblas on line 247

comments_0.comment_text:
Hey, this is the MXNet Label Bot.
 Thank you for submitting the issue! I will try and suggest some labels so that the appropriate MXNet community members can help resolve it.
 Here are my recommended labels: Test

comments_1.comment_text:
We have it as a switch (see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/Makefile#L255>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/Makefile#L255</denchmark-link>
 ). You should have USE_BLAS=open to use openblas

comments_2.comment_text:
so can we ignore openblas  on
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/Makefile#L217>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/Makefile#L217</denchmark-link>
  ?
 Thanks,
 Sean.

comments_3.comment_text:
I might be wrong. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/larroy>@larroy</denchmark-link>
  Can you take a look?

comments_4.comment_text: What's the question exactly?  The description on the ticket is not clear.

comments_5.comment_text:
When you build with make and want to set it to openblas, do you use  or ?  <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/Makefile#L255>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/Makefile#L255</denchmark-link>
  seems to indicate it should be  while <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/Makefile#L217>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/Makefile#L217</denchmark-link>
  seems to indicate

comments_6.comment_text: Yes, this seems to be wrong.
